t: Hanson Guitars buys Lakland; brand name will continue with model changes
s: Hanson Guitars of Chicago has bought the Lakland bass company (see press release below). Founded in 1994, Lakland basses have earned a wide following among professionals, both big names and players still in the trenches, with their attention to detail and great sounding basses.
